/usr/bin/cc     CMakeFiles/clipboard.dir/clipboard.c.o CMakeFiles/clipboard.dir/__/deps/getopt.c.o  -o clipboard -rdynamic ../src/libglfw.so.3.1 -lGL -lm -lrt -lm -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/yb/Documents/Projects/ogl/external/glfw-3.1.2/src
